ygData.subject: RE: Char Carillion
ygData.msgSnippet: ... no kidding.  I would believe it.  Sounds like something fishy those lame-o coders would do.  At least it doesn t look like a bag on my hand, god I hated
ygData.messageBody:
> Maybe it's just the darkwood piccalo that does that, and a plain old
> wooden flute works better than a god item. :-) (teasing)

no kidding. I would believe it. Sounds like something fishy
those lame-o coders would do. At least it doesn't look like a
bag on my hand, god I hated that.

> The guy that looted Evensong from you better owe you a lot. :/

Well, I can only really give my perspective. The guy that took
it is a very well known, well respected leader on our server.
He and I get along very well.

That said...

People who accidentally loot very important nodrop items are likely
to find themselves not ever looting again. I can't say that I've
ever seen it done until that night, as people are usually very good
at looting appropriately. One poor cleric accidentally looted the
crown from Tranix one night, and he caught major hell for it. He
wasn't a bad guy, in fact he's an incredible cleric. But the accident
cost several enchanters a new headpiece. It's nothing more than
irritating I guess you could put it.

I was invited into the Plane by a separate group than the group he
was in. I didn't realize this at first. Apparently, his team was
breaking out hate, and another team came in behind them (the team
who requested me up there). So there was definitely bad blood to
start things off, although the two teams cooperated eventually.

The Plane of Hate can be shared. In fact, it will be in the future.
We had over 50 people in there and it was lag free. You just have
to take the teams to two different areas. SE and SW, or SW and NW,
or whichever.

To make a long story short, it was my assumption that he and his
team were disgusted with the fact that the team I was with was
even on the planes after they had reserved it. As soon as I
approached the Maestro corpse, the person in question bent down,
and the corpse disappeared. He stated he accidentally looted it
and never apologized at all. In fact no one did from the other
team. It's all really suspicious. And while they didn't have to
let anyone loot it. We had been sharing nodrops the whole night.
I just hope that he didn't do it on purpose. I'm trying to believe
that he didn't, because I really respect the guy.

Harmonic.
